name: Quran.com - Quran Translation & Tafsir
description: Comprehensive Quran resource with multiple translations, transliterations, audio recitations, and tafsir (exegesis). Provides verse-by-verse navigation of all 114 surahs.

categories.name: Surahs (Chapters)
categories.description: The 114 chapters of the Quran, from Al-Fatiha to An-Nas

categories.name: Juz (Parts)
categories.description: The Quran divided into 30 parts for ease of recitation

categories.name: Pages
categories.description: The Quran by page number (604 pages in standard Madani mushaf)

search.searchTips: Search for English terms or Arabic words. Use 'surah:verse' format for direct navigation (e.g., '2:255' for Ayatul Kursi). Topic searches return relevant verses.

contentPage.description: Content pages are individual verses or surah pages. Format is surah/ayah (e.g., /2/255 for Al-Baqarah verse 255).

revelationType.description: Whether revealed in Makkah or Madinah

valueMap.meccan: Revealed in Makkah before Hijrah - often about faith fundamentals
valueMap.medinan: Revealed in Madinah after Hijrah - often about laws and society

extraction.contentNotes: Quran.com is JavaScript-heavy; content may require JavaScript rendering. The translation depends on user settings - Sahih International is default. Always cite as Surah:Ayah format (e.g., Quran 2:255). Arabic text is the original revelation; translations are scholarly interpretations.

aiNotes: Quran.com requires Puppeteer for full content extraction due to heavy JavaScript. Citation format is 'Quran [Surah]:[Ayah]' (e.g., Quran 2:255). Always distinguish between the Arabic text (divine revelation) and translations (human interpretation). Multiple translations available - Sahih International is widely accepted. For tafsir, navigate to /surah/verse/tafsirs.
